vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ποτᾰμο-φόρητος, ον,
carried away by a river, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: swept away by a torrential flow of a river flooded
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
swept away by a torrential flow of a river flooded
borne along, or carried away or swept away by a flood or torrent, Rev. 12:15*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kéo người xuống sông; để cuốn trôi nàng trong dòng nước. ποταμός (G4215) + φορέω (G5409)
